title.rendered: A Mobile App to Boost Cash Flow On-the-Go

content.rendered:
If you’re always on the move, a mobile app might help. From construction and catering to landscaping and everything in between, small business owners are constantly on the go. Unfortunately, work doesn’t stop just because you’re out on the road traveling to the next gig.

Luckily, technology has evolved to the point where small business owners can proverbially bring their offices with them wherever they go thanks to the emergence of smartphones, mobile devices, and 4G networks. With the right tools, you can stay in touch with clients, shop for necessarily supplies and materials, and even collaborate on projects with employees and contractors—all from the palm of your hand.

Now, thanks to Fundbox’s iOS mobile app, you can also get cash for invoices from anywhere you happen to find yourself over the course of the day. With the app, overcoming cash flow gaps is easier and faster than ever before.

Today’s businesses are increasingly mobile. According to a recent study, more than 80% of small business owners use a mobile device at least once a day for work-related reasons.

All companies need access to cash in order to grow. Unfortunately, you can’t ignore cash shortages just because you’re not in the office. When money’s tight, you need to act quickly. With Fundbox’s mobile app, you can.

The app works exactly the same as our desktop version. Sign into your account and select which invoices you want to advance, and the funds will be available as soon as one business day.

Stop worrying about money shortages. When it comes to cash flow problems, there’s no sense in kicking the can down the road. When you need cash for invoices and you’re on the go, use the Fundbox app and get the peace of mind that comes with knowing the money you need to grow your business is only a tap of the finger away.

Not a Fundbox user? Not a problem. You can sign up to become one through the app as well. It’ll only take a few seconds. Need help figuring out how to use our mobile app? Read this.
